Whoops, forgot.

::Zardus::

Zardus looks back at Gotron, turning a corner and continuing on 
toward the shuttles and other vehicles.

"Well, if you can't get them to agree to a cease-fire of some sort, 
then try to establish peaceful relations. I don't suggest entering 
their base, because they can trap you that way. If they become 
hostile, get out of there."

He stops at a door and opens it, walking into the shuttle bay. There 
were dozens of shuttles, one-bot vehicles, and cargo-vessels parked 
all around them.

"I suggest you take one of these," he says, walking up to the one-bot 
vehocles and gesturing toward them (you can say what the one you 
choose looks like, Soulstice). "They're fast and hard to aim at, if 
things go that badly. If you succeed in making them like you, then 
try to offer a cease-fire or a treaty. Contact me if you're 
negotiating a treaty though."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Gotron followed Zardus.
> 
> Gotron: So, any special instructions to give me? Give me a run down 
of what
> I need to do...
